issue.title: [R] Fixed typo and made code running in vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7810](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7810). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There was a typo in the vignette from `nyc-taix` to `nyc-taxi` and also add some code to create folders, where they are missing.
